Uses of Class
io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder

  • Packages that use MessageToMessageEncoder 
    Package Description
    io.netty.handler.codec.base64
    Encoder and decoder which transform a Base64-encoded String or ByteBuf into a decoded ByteBuf and vice versa.
    io.netty.handler.codec.bytes
    Encoder and decoder which transform an array of bytes into a ByteBuf and vice versa.
    io.netty.handler.codec.http
    Encoder, decoder and their related message types for HTTP.
    io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx
    Encoder, decoder, handshakers and their related message types for Web Socket data frames.
    io.netty.handler.codec.protobuf
    Encoder and decoder which transform a Google Protocol Buffers Message into a ByteBuf and vice versa.
    io.netty.handler.codec.rtsp
    An RTSP extension based on the HTTP codec.
    io.netty.handler.codec.sctp
    Decoder and encoders to manage message completion and multi-streaming codec in SCTP/IP.
    io.netty.handler.codec.spdy
    Encoder, decoder, session handler and their related message types for the SPDY protocol.
    io.netty.handler.codec.string
    Encoder and decoder which transform a String into a ByteBuf and vice versa.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.base64

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.base64 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Base64Encoder
      Encodes a ByteBuf into a Base64-encoded ByteBuf.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.bytes

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.bytes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ByteArrayEncoder
      Encodes the requested array of bytes into a ByteBuf.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.http

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.http 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpObjectEncoder<H extends HttpMessage>
      Encodes an HttpMessage or an HttpContent into a ByteBuf.
      class  HttpRequestEncoder
      Encodes an HttpRequest or an HttpContent into a ByteBuf.
      class  HttpResponseEncoder
      Encodes an HttpResponse or an HttpContent into a ByteBuf.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WebSocket00FrameEncoder
      Encodes a WebSocketFrame into a ByteBuf.
      class  WebSocket07FrameEncoder
      Encodes a web socket frame into wire protocol version 7 format.
      class  WebSocket08FrameEncoder
      Encodes a web socket frame into wire protocol version 8 format.
      class  WebSocket13FrameEncoder
      Encodes a web socket frame into wire protocol version 13 format.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.protobuf

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.protobuf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProtobufEncoder
      Encodes the requested Google Protocol Buffers Message and MessageLite into a ByteBuf.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.rtsp

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.rtsp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RtspEncoder
      Encodes an RTSP message represented in HttpMessage or an HttpContent into a ByteBuf.
      class  RtspObjectEncoder<H extends HttpMessage>
      Deprecated. 
      Use RtspEncoder instead.
      class  RtspRequestEncoder
      Deprecated. 
      Use RtspEncoder directly instead
      class  RtspResponseEncoder
      Deprecated. 
      Use RtspEncoder directly instead

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.sctp

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.sctp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SctpOutboundByteStreamHandler
      A ChannelHandler which transform ByteBuf to SctpMessage and send it through a specific stream with given protocol identifier.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.spdy

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.spdy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpdyHttpEncoder
      Encodes HttpRequests, HttpResponses, and HttpContents into SpdySynStreamFrames and SpdySynReplyFrames.

    • Uses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.string

      Subclasses of MessageToMessageEncoder in io.netty.handler.codec.string 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StringEncoder
      Encodes the requested String into a ByteBuf.
